About LightCastle Partners

Our entrepreneurial journey started back in 2013 with a simple vision: to inspire businesses in Bangladesh to advance the economy. Between then and now, we have strived to create impact in 400+ organizations across 40+ industries.

We believe the Bangladesh opportunity is exciting – led by your goals and accomplishments. And to that end, we are here to support and collaborate.
